forcessourl.title: Lock SSO URL
forcessourl.description: Configures and locks the SSO URL

login_domain.title: Login Domain
login_domain.description: Set the email address domain that users can login with

AddFWException.title: Disable UAC Prompt
AddFWException.description: Disable UAC prompt when logging into Zoom

LastLoginType.title: Remember Last Login
LastLoginType.description: Remember the last login type used

keepsignedin.title: Stay Signed In
keepsignedin.description: Client automatically logs in to the last account used

ZAutoUpdate.title: Enable Updates
ZAutoUpdate.description: Allow updates through the client. If set to 'false', will not report updates are available, even if manually checked. The currently installed version will be listed as up-to-date.

EnableSilentAutoUpdate.title: Enable Silent Auto Updates
EnableSilentAutoUpdate.description: Allows the desktop client to silently check for updates. This option requires AutoUpdate option to be enabled, and will fail if not enabled

DefaultUsePortraitView.title: Default to Portrait Mode
DefaultUsePortraitView.description: Default to Portrait Mode upon opening Zoom

zdisablesendvideo.title: Disable Sending Video
zdisablesendvideo.description: Disable sending video from the Zoom Client

zdisablerecvvideo.title: Disable Receiving Video
zdisablerecvvideo.description: Disable receiving video from the Zoom Client

disablecomputeraudio.title: Disable Computer Audio
disablecomputeraudio.description: Disable use of computer audio on the Zoom Client

EnableEchoCancellation.title: Enable Echo Cancellation
EnableEchoCancellation.description: Enables echo cancellation for the microphone audio

setusesystemdefaultspeakerforvoip.title: Use System Default for Computer Audio
setusesystemdefaultspeakerforvoip.description: Uses the system default speaker when using computer audio

setusesystemdefaultmicforvoip.title: Use System Default for Computer Microphone
setusesystemdefaultmicforvoip.description: Uses the system default speaker when using microphone audio

ZAutoFullScreenWhenViewShare.title: Auto Full Screen When Viewing
ZAutoFullScreenWhenViewShare.description: Automatically enter full screen when viewing shared content

ZAutoFitWhenViewShare.title: Auto Fit to Window When Viewing
ZAutoFitWhenViewShare.description: Automatically fit to window when viewing shared content

FullScreenWhenJoin.title: Enable Full Screen on Meeting Join
FullScreenWhenJoin.description: Full Screen when starting or joining a meeting

AutoHideToolbar.title: Auto Hide Meeting Controls
AutoHideToolbar.description: Always show meeting controls (Disable auto-hide toolbar)

MuteVoipWhenJoin.title: Disable Microphone on Meeting Join
MuteVoipWhenJoin.description: Always mute microphone when joining a meeting

ShowConnectedTime.title: Show Meeting Attendance Length
ShowConnectedTime.description: Show the length of time that the user has been in a meeting

DisableScreenShare.title: Auto Disable Screen Sharing
DisableScreenShare.description: Disable Screen Share when starting or joining a meeting

disableremotecontrol.title: Disable Remote Control During Screen Sharing
disableremotecontrol.description: Disables Remote Control when screen sharing

disableremotesupport.title: Disable 1:1 Remote Support During Screen Sharing
disableremotesupport.description: Disables 1:1 remote support when screen sharing

zdisablelocalrecord.title: Disable Local Recording
zdisablelocalrecord.description: Disables Local Recording from the Zoom Client

zdisablecmr.title: Disable Cloud Recording
zdisablecmr.description: Disables Cloud Recording from the Zoom Client

disablevirtualbkgnd.title: Disable Virtual Background
disablevirtualbkgnd.description: Disables use of the Virtual Background feature

EnableIndependentDataPort.title: Enable Split Port Traffic
EnableIndependentDataPort.description: Split traffic across different ports for easier identification

EnableSSLVerification.title: SSL Verification
EnableSSLVerification.description: The Zoom Client will verify the server certificate

bandwidthlimitup.title: Maximum Bandwidth
bandwidthlimitup.description: Limit the Maximum amount of bandwidth by the Mac client

bandwidthlimitdown.title: Minimum Bandwidth
bandwidthlimitdown.description: Limit the Minimum amount of bandwidth used by the Mac client

recordpath.title: Local Recording Path
recordpath.description: Set path for local meeting recording files

proxybypass.title: Proxy Bypass Rule
proxybypass.description: Set proxy bypass rule for the Zoom Client

proxy.title: Proxy
proxy.description: Set the proxy server for the Zoom Client

proxypac.title: Proxy PAC
proxypac.description: Set proxy server to client with PAC URL for the Zoom Client
